Comment: Myndian peninsula. Myndos in the fifth century was much less important (paid less tribute) than Termera.
Dikaia comes in a journey between Aineia and Poteidaia and in a geographical list between Therme and Poteidaia (Pliny). I locate it at the modern day Nea Gonia, Greece.
Eretria was situated on the coast of Euboia about twelve miles east of Chalkis.
The founder is possibily Azeus, grandfather of the Minyan leaders at Troy. Locate it between Dardanos and Abydos. Certainly in Troad. I locate it to modern day Kalabaklı, Turkey.
